content.question: Which of the following describes a pattern in the unemployment rate, according to the data on the map?

choices.label: The southern region of Nigeria has the highest levels of unemployment.
Those who have just reached working age are most likely to be unemployed in Nigeria.
Major cities in Nigeria are most likely to experience the highest levels of unemployment.
The overall unemployment rate in Nigeria is 40% across most of the country.

content.answer: The southern region of Nigeria has the highest levels of unemployment.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
